title: Theresa May – 2018 New Year’s Message
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of Theresa May’s 2018 New Year Message made on 31 December 2017.
content:
[![](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/theresamay-1.jpg)](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/theresamay-1.jpg)
